name: Goobey and The Pizza Quest
description:
Goobey is BACK in his debut adventure, Goobey and The Pizza Quest. Our wobbly jiggly orange hero individual must use his world-famous Goobey Jump and reclaim all 100 lost pizzas for the citizens of Durdleton! Jump around! Talk to funny 2D characters in a colorful 3D world! Get pizza! Have a good time!

Features:

- A game that was made in a week and a half (woah!)

- Collect OVER 99 pizzas

- Jump to your heart's content

- Floating mushrooms

- Humor

**CONTROLS**

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Jump (hold to jump higher)

F - Talk to characters

Mouse/LMB - Select dialogue options

I recommend maximizing the game window. After starting the game you may have to click inside the window to get your mouse cursor to disappear.

Credits for assets used:

dklon, opengameart.org/users/dklon

SubspaceAudio, opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio

Quaternius, quaternius.com/index.html
